reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: Our first trip back to Bali since 2000 was with 9 members of our family - 3 generations. We wanted to share the beauty of the people and the island with our children, and grand-children. We found the TravelAdvisor site very helpful in making Puri Santrian our choice.
reviews.title: Puri Santrian exceeded all expectations

likes.liked: — value for money, stunning gardens and landscaping, great staff, quiet location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The travel- agent had requested adjoining/adjacent rooms and this is exactly what was provided. The Garden Wing Rooms were clean and spacious and located close to the smaller pool, restaurant area and beach. The children made this pool their base for the entire stay. The adults alternated between the wonderful 'day beds' along the beachfront and the pool. One important aspect of the gardens was that there was always a shady spot available whether morning or afternoon, unlike some other hotels in the area.
reviews.title: Nothing special

likes.disliked: — Sunbed grabbing, dour (won't even say hello) people from a certain european country - You know who you are !!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: Everyone in our group enjoyed the full buffet breakfast which we always took in the upstairs section of the restaurant which overlooked the beach and swimming pools . Staff here were welcoming and attentive and took a special interest in looking after the children. We loved the beachfront dining offered along both sides of the pathway and broke the hotel record for the most mixed-fruit juice drinks consumed in a day! For variety (and value for money) we also dined at the nearby beachfront trio of restaurants just south of the hotel. Also loved the Happy Hour at the swim-up bar at the main pool.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel but Warm Beer

likes.disliked: — Worst Pool Bar in the World

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Best aspects: the helpful, genuine staff; the spectacular landscaping and pool areas; the floating pontoons; the live music on he beachfront every Sunday and Thursday. We left the hotel only once to visit the Bali Elephant Safari Park in Taro just north of Ubud which is a must-do experience.
reviews.title: A perfect quirky hotel

likes.liked: — Everything - the grounds, the pools, the restaurant....
likes.disliked: — Breakfast - we had continental breakfast included which was a but 'same same'

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007
reviews.text: We would not hesitate in returning to Puri Santrian in the future - it was a wonderful choice for our large group.
reviews.title: nice beach hotel boutique style

likes.liked: — pool and gardens, a proximity to shops and restaurants

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had booked for a beach room, which was a bit of a dissapointment. Very dark and with a bathroom that was not that clean. So we upgraded to a clubroom. This room was absolutely perfect and we highly recommened it to everyone. A great bed, perfect bathroom and a very nice terrace. Another plus was the beautiful clubpool.
reviews.title: great place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Beautiful hotel, lovely people infact can't find anything to complain about. breakfast everything you could want and the Mezzanine restaurant was the best in Sanur and surprisingly cheap. We will return.
reviews.title: wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008
reviews.text: We have just returned from 12 nights at the Puri Santrian and have nothing bad to say about it.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were lovely (we had Beach), big enough, nice bathroom, cleaned meticulously every day, with free water thrown in. I have seen alot of reviews on this site complaining that the rooms were very dark - this is because it is the tropics and all rooms are designed to avoid the sunlight - it keeps the rooms cool. I did not have a problem at all, the airconditioning worked wonderfully as well. When I go back I might ask for a room on the ground floor as we had a 3rd floor room - though it had a great view!
reviews.title: Quite satisfied

likes.liked: — Beautiful shaded beachfront, pools and gardens. High standard cleanliness.
likes.disliked: — Roomsand bathroom needs refreshing. Reception lacked competence, though one such experience, so maybe I should not generalize.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The swimmming pools were lovely - not being sun loungers we only used one in the evenings - a very nice pool with the bar in it - marvelous. The bar staff were very friendly and the gin and tonics fabulous! There seemed plenty of sun loungers but I never used them, so dont know if there were enough. There were some lovely pavillions and other seating areas both around the pool, on the beach and in the water, so if you like that sunbathing sort of thing I would think you would be very happy.
reviews.title: Superb Place

likes.liked: — Clean, they couldn't do more for you

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I got a massage or two outside of the hotel (left along the beach), very nice, great view down the beach while having a great massage - I can recommend that - much cheaper than the Spa.
reviews.title: Pure Bliss

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We were on a diving holiday and this was certainly a lovely base for diving, close to Bali Scuba who were very good, professional and friendly dive operators.
reviews.title: Good place, but a little unfriendly !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We liked the real Balinese feel to the hotel, which extended throughout the rooms, gardens and the whole environment.
reviews.title: Friendly hotel in good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We stayed in a garden room, which was large, well appointed and looked onto what looked like a mini jungle. We had a first floor room, which I think would be much better than on ground level as it looks that the dense gardens may mean there is little light in some of the ground floor rooms.
reviews.title: Balinese Paradise.....loved it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were very friendly, helpful yet unobtrusive.
reviews.title: Mostly Good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled solo
reviews.text: We booked on a room only basis in order to enjoy the range of restaurants that can be found nearby. However, we did use the beach restaurant on a couple of occasions and found the food to be very good. The prices, even although they are more expensive than out of the hotel, are still very reasonable when compared to English prices and to other resorts we have used throughout Europe.
reviews.title: Best Value in Sanur

likes.liked: — The hotel is pretty big but designed to feel small.
likes.disliked: — Garden rooms were run down. Too many package groups.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of the hotel suited us well. There is good selection of shops, bars and restaurants nearby. The beach is well maintained by hotel staff and the beach facilities supplied by the hotel, beds, towels, sun shades and bar service were good.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, good value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Club Santrian on Jan 31st to Feb 3rd. The atmosphere was beautiful. We just think that the service staff in the restaurants need some training. They were always missing! During breakfast, guests waited too long for eggs and coffee (the waiters went missing). There was nobody tending the place. We also waited too long to order drinks and paying bills at the beach restaurant. The most dissapointing moments for us was that we booked honeymoon package which include 'One Romantic Candle-lit Dinner by the Beach'. We have reminded the staff in the afternoon while having drinks by the beach about our dinner on that night, Feb 2nd. They confirmed that we would have a sit at the gazebo (dinner by the beach). When we reached the restaurant, there was another couple sitting there!!! The couple did reserve for a dinner that day but ours suppose to be special! To think that we booked in advance way before them and we paid more (Club Santrian). A staff said that they made a mistake. We were sitted at the table inside, far from the beach. They did apologize for the mistake but that is all. Poor service!
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel With Dissapointing Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we stayed at the Puri Santrian from 18 - 26 February 2008, this was our second visit, we stayed in the Garden wing fist floor.
reviews.title: brilliant Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was lovely, clean and tidy.
reviews.title: We would definitely go back

likes.disliked: — Room was very basic but okay

reviews.title: Great hotel
reviews.text: The Hotel staff were excellent, the grounds are beautiful, the pools were great. faciliteis superb.

reviews.title: Lovely Hotel
reviews.text: well located in peaceful sanur, lots of resturants within a short distance.

reviews.title: puri was perfect
reviews.text: This was our first trip to Bali and will definetly not be our last , we had a great time and loved the resort. It was one of the best we had ever stayed in, it was more a 5 star resort than a 4. We stayed in the garden view rooms and found them to be clean and comfortable. Weather was warm and the staff were very friendly . We chose the Puri Santrian because of all the great reviews we had read about on this site . We had some tasty meals at the Puri Santrian and most nights we would walk down the beach to Donald's restaurant and also Bobby"s they were both very good and very cheap. We cant wait to go back! Puri was perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: Stayed at Puri Santrian in April 2007 and upgraded before arriving direct with the hotel to the club room, after reading bad reports regarding the beach and garden rooms.
reviews.title: at the quite end of sanur
Going back to Bali
reviews.text: Disappointed, the club rooms are ok, but still very dark inside. More spacious than the other rooms, but certainly not worth the money. The room spelt very musty and appeared clean until i dropped something which rolled under a piece of furniture!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007
reviews.text: All the rooms are dark inside due to the fast amount of trees around the gardens. I had read reports about the beautiful gardens, but to be honest i wasnt that impressed.
reviews.title: very good hotel
Great Hotel
reviews.text: The hotel is located on the quite side of Sanur, limited restaurants and not on the best stretch of beach. Although the hotel did their best to clear the debris and seaweed away daily it did seem to gather
